hasMenuItem.description: Pizza sauce, pineapple, ham, and mozzarella cheese.

hasMenuItem.name: 10 Traditional Wings Jalapeno Lime Dry Rub
hasMenuItem.description: Crispy wings seasoned with a dry rub of jalapeño and lime, offering a zesty and slightly spicy flavor profile.

hasMenuItem.name: 10  Traditional Wings - Hot
hasMenuItem.description: Coated in hot sauce, these 10 traditional chicken wings offer a classic and spicy flavor.

hasMenuItem.name: 10 Traditional Wings Chipotle
hasMenuItem.description: Crispy wings tossed in a spicy and smoky chipotle sauce, typically includes ten pieces per serving.

hasMenuItem.name: 10 Traditional Wings Honey Garlic
hasMenuItem.description: Crispy chicken wings tossed in a honey garlic sauce, combining the sweetness of honey with a hint of garlic.

hasMenuItem.name: 10 Traditional Wings Lemon Pepper Dry Rub
hasMenuItem.description: Ten traditional wings coated in a dry rub of zesty lemon and aromatic black pepper, offering a citrusy and slightly spicy taste profile.

hasMenuItem.name: 10 Traditional Wings Teriyaki
hasMenuItem.description: Ten chicken wings, traditionally prepared and tossed in a sweet teriyaki sauce, offering a blend of soy, ginger, and a hint of sweetness.

hasMenuItem.name: 10 Traditional Wings BBQ
hasMenuItem.description: Chicken wings, marinated and cooked to a golden finish, then generously coated in a classic BBQ sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: 10 Traditional Wings Salt & Pepper Dry Rub
hasMenuItem.description: Crispy chicken wings seasoned with a simple yet classic salt and pepper dry rub, embodying the essence of traditional Italian herbs and spices.
